1.0.name: wordpress/deezer-widget
1.0.description:
A Deezer play button widget.

Inserts the same play button that can be found on http://developers.deezer.com/musicplugins/player. Album ID and playlist ID can be found on http://deezer.com/, check the URL. There is a limit of 30 sec per track on album and playlist widget. There is NO limit of time on radio widget.

Advanced Options

You can specify the height and width of the iframe in the widget options. (recommended size is: 270 x 600) You can show the cover of the song or not. You can activate autoplay and the player will start automatically.
